1.content:
So which of the digidestined will we choose:

-Sora: She weighs 250 pounds and is a belly heavy girl with a blue hat, who constantly has to pull her shirt down over her belly but it keeps pushing the shirt up.

-Mimi: She weighs 280 pounds and is a bottom heavy girl with a pink cowgirl hat and her skirt is always getting to small.

-Kairi: She weighs 235 pounds and is quite a cubby little girl, despite being only half the size of the rest of the girls she still weighs more than Rika and almost as most as much as Sora.

-Rika: She weighs 200 pounds and isn't as heavy as the other girls but her belly is still big enough to peek out of her shirt.
1.title: Digi-Girls

choices: The same Sora from the previous Chapter.
11.content: Do you want to change Sora’s weight, or do you want to stay at 250 lbs?
11.title: Weight Change

choices: The same Mimi from the previous Chapter.
A hecking hoooge chonker of Mimi.
12.content: Do you want to change Mimi’s weight, or do you want to stay at 280 lbs?
12.title: Weight Change

choices: the same Kairi from the previous chapter
13.content: Do you want to change Kairi's weight, or do you want to stay at 235 lbs?
13.title: Do you want a different size Kairi?

14.content: are you sure your what rika?
14.title: Rika

choices: Same weight as the default choice
141.content: Do you want to change Rika’s weight, or do you want to stay at 200 lbs?
141.title: Weight Change

1413.content: How bigger should Rika be?
1413.title: A bigger Rika

142.content:
need more then how about:

-Zoe Orimoto: She weighs 215 pounds and is a top heavy girl with a pink cap with two points that resemble a cat's ears coming out of it, and her striped shirt is always getting to small/tight.

or

-Yoshino "Yoshi" Fujieda: She weighs 410 pounds and is a well-rounded girl, at 18 yrs old she is one fo the oldest and heaviest girls at camp (maybe a junior counsler?).
142.title: no, need more

1423.content:
you want more? how about these two?


-Akari ‘Angie’ Hinomoto: She weighs about 260 pounds and is a belly heavy girl with red hair in spiky pigtails, who wears shortalls which always seem a bit small/tight. She has a ‘refined’ sweet tooth.

or

-Nene Amano: She weighs around 220 pounds and is a top heavy girl with a strange hairstyle that none the less, many would describe her as ‘beautiful’. She’s Enigmatic to others at times.
1423.title: a few more

14233.content:
Hmmm....how about this one?

-Airu Suzaki: She weights about 230 pounds, and is a bottom-heavy girl with a short skirt that tends to be too short on purpose. She loves cute things, though what she considers cute sometimes doesn’t line up with the norm. Tends to get paired with Nene a lot.
14233.title: other

142332.content:
Or this one, perhaps?

-Eri Karan: She weighs around 300 pounds, and is a well rounded girl who works as one of the camp’s two junior councillors(the other one is Yoshino). She is lively with a strong, kind personality, but is prone to bouts of loneliness, which she tries to stifle with food. She’s not the best cook, either......
142332.title: other

1423322.content:
How about this girl?

-Meiko Mochizuki: She weighs around 235 pounds, and is quite chubby, especially in her lower half, what with her tight stockings and all. She has a strong heart, but is very reserved.
1423322.title: other

14233222.content:
Or this girl?
-Ai Kashiki: She weight about 265 pounds and is a bottom heavy girl, constantly needing to fiddle with her dress as result. She’s an avid reader and book lover, and usually reads with her meals.
14233222.title: other

info.description:
The story is about the digidestined living their normal lives, but with one twist. They are fat and are going to fat camp.So just choose a digidestined and get started.
So here are the rules:
-no killing off the characters
-No sex
-No vore
-button popping allowed but not encouraged
-ripping of clothes encouraged
-No immensly high gain like 1000 pounds
Other than that, go nuts!
